synopsis.text: Midnight King, the notorious bike gang of Shibaura known for their ruthless and underhanded tactics, has crossed the line by taking an innocent classmate of Daiki Hayami hostage. Enraged by this audacious act, the once legendary duo, Daiki and his partner Jin Takayama, reunite to bring justice to the chaotic streets. Known as the invincible boxer, Daiki's fists of fury combine with Jin's professional fighting skills to form the unstoppable force known as the Two Man Army. As they clash with the cunning Shinjo Brothers, leaders of the Midnight King, prepare for a violent yet exhilarating showdown that will leave you on the edge of your seat!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
